t:
My home security business has been blooming since there had been several serial killings in the locality.



It also helps me as a serial killer since I'm in control of people's home security now.
c:
I know exactly when and how to trigger the alarm so that I can escape safely.



#security #home #business #serialkiller #murder #trick #blooming #easy





https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Rader
"He worked at the Wichita-based office of ADT Security Services from 1974 to 1988, where he installed security alarms as part of his job, in many cases for homeowners concerned about the BTK killings."
